direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create default STUN messages with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve creating STUN messages related to bindings, though they serve different purposes (request vs. response).
Both methods involve creating indications that may access or manipulate similar resources (e.g., peer addresses).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
